General.Name: Eche Izquierdo
General.Description: Echeverría Izquierdo S.A. engages in the engineering and construction activities in Chile. It operates through Construction and Mining Services, Middle-Income Housing Solutions, and Other Business segments. The company is involved in the civil and industrial works, assembly of heavy structures, and electromechanical assembly of the crushers, overland belts, stockpiles, reclaim tunnels, lime and pebble crushing plants; EPC project works; maintenance of mining plants and equipment; chemical and mechanical cleaning; specialized industrial services; design and construction of post-tensioned structures; reinforced earth walls; slope anchors and bracing; special soil solutions; and containment structures and deep foundations. It also constructs and sells offices, hospitals, hotels, shopping centers, residential buildings, and specialty projects, such as post-tensioning, deep excavations, underground works, commercial and road infrastructure, industrial maintenance services, engineering services, and turnkey projects. In addition, the company develops and sells private homes, government-subsidized social housings, multi-family residential-income projects, as well as provides land bracing solutions for residential buildings. Echeverría Izquierdo S.A. was founded in 1978 and is based in Las Condes, Chile.
